body:
so i was enjoying a match of nebula whilst recording and some noob comes along and starts to grief me i say ' stop please ' he doesnt i say ' STOP PLEASE ' he does'nt i say ' STOP OR I WILL REPORT ' he doesnt stop i reported him and a mod didnt come so i reported him again  because he griefed me and i was really sad because i spent alot of time on the house and he just recked it so yea. then a staff member came and he was blabbering about and saying STOP IT MRME and he gave me a warning and then the noob/griefer didnt get kicked or not even a warning. so if a Mod or SR Mod or better the Directors could talk to [removed] it would be greatly apriciated.  

p.s. i think some of the new [removed] are getting a bit full of them selfs and are kicking ppl for ' fun ' 

Mrme2298

replies.body:
Firstly, if you want to complain, contact a manager or Director via Skype or support@avicus.net.

Secondly, please use proper English and grammar whilst writing "mature" topics regarding other players. It's very hard to understand and makes you seem less believable. Another thing that makes you seem less mature is the "xD" at the end. It makes it seem like a joke. 

Asking other players to report is extremely annoying to other players and staff. I can see why the staff member warned you. It was within his right. And I will defend all of the jnr mods on this one. They're doing an excellent job and I will vouch for them all. None are getting "full of themselves".
replies.body_tagged:

Asking other players to report is extremely annoying to other players and staff. I can see why the staff member warned you. It was within his right. And I will defend all of the jnr mods on this one. They're doing an excellent job and I will vouch for them all. None are getting "full of themselves".
